net.infonode.tabbedpanel Core classes for creating and using tabbed panels and tabs

static TabDropDownListVisiblePolicy TabDropDownListVisiblePolicy.MORE_THAN_ONE_TAB
          More than one tab list policy.
static TabDropDownListVisiblePolicy TabDropDownListVisiblePolicy.TABS_NOT_VISIBLE
          Tabs not visible list policy.

          Gets the tab drop down list visible policies.
 TabDropDownListVisiblePolicy TabbedPanelProperties.getTabDropDownListVisiblePolicy()
           Gets the tab drop down list visible policy, i.e. when a drop down list with the tabs should be visible.
 

Methods in net.infonode.tabbedpanel with parameters of type TabDropDownListVisiblePolicy
 void TabDropDownListVisiblePolicyProperty.set(Object object, TabDropDownListVisiblePolicy policy)
          Sets the TabDropDownListVisiblePolicy
 TabbedPanelProperties TabbedPanelProperties.setTabDropDownListVisiblePolicy(TabDropDownListVisiblePolicy policy)
           Sets the tab drop down list visible policy, i.e. when a drop down list with the tabs should be visible The drop down list will show an icon for the tab if the tab implements the IconProvider and the text will be retrieved by calling toString() on the tab.
